annotations.description: This week I give you a great modern classic from Jeffery Morganthaler one of my absolute favorite bartenders. This drink definitely takes a page from Dick Br...
annotations.title: Fall In A Glass, The Bourbon Renewal

textContent:
2oz or 60ml Bourbon
1oz or 30ml  Fresh Lemon Juice
.5oz or 15ml Creme de Cassis
.5oz or 15ml Simple Syrup
1-2 Dashes Angostura Bitters
Lemon Wedge or Wheel

Shake and double strain over ice in rocks glass. 
Garnish with lemon wedge or wheel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GJYBDDEh6-U
title: Bourbon Renewal
